sub_title: Boek schrijven met Perdiep.nl. Jouw meest betrokken & praktische schrijfcoach bij het schrijven van jouw boek (also in English). Reserveer nu gratis op mijn website een Schrijversconsult. Klik hiervoor op 'Contact Info'.
summary:
Ervaren schrijfcoach/experienced writer's coach & Boekfluencer/Bookfluencer @ Perdiep.nl.

Het is mijn missie om zoveel mogelijk mensen te helpen hun kennis, methode, boodschap of verhaal in boekvorm op inspirerende wijze te schrijven. Zodat ook zij zoveel mogelijk mensen met hun boek kunnen helpen en inspireren. Op deze manier helpen we samen de wereld een stukje mooier te maken.
Boek een gratis Schrijversconsult via: https://perdiep.nl/schrijfcoaching

It is my mission to help as many as possible entrepreneurs, coaches, trainers and people with a message or a legacy writing their own inspiring books. So they can help and inspire many people with their books to create together a better world. 

I am highly skilled in writing, publishing, Neuro Linguistic Programming (NLP), meditation and other personal development methods to help people thrive and manifest their dreams.

awards.title: Nomination VVOJ-Prijs voor Onderzoeksjournalistiek 'De Loep' (2012)
awards.description: Nominated (one of the last three) for the Dutch-Flemish Prize of Investigative Journalism for the book 'Slaven in de Polder' about human trafficking and prostitution in and from the Netherlands with my co-author Martijn Roessingh at the daily newspaper Trouw.

awards.title: Honorable Mention VVOJ-Prijs voor Onderzoeksjournalistiek 'De Loep' (2011)
awards.description: Honorable Mention for the Prize for Investigative Journalism at the Dutch-Flemish Organisation for Investigative Journalists in 2011 for the articles about the Dutch law 'Wet BIBOB' and how the Dutch governments are checking criminal activities of admitters for permits for businesses with my co-worker Sjors van Beek at the daily newspaper Trouw and the magazine Binnenlands Bestuur.

- Professional speaker for hire about writing, coaching and books.
- Trainer and workshop leader for hire about writing, coaching and books.
profile_positions.title: Professional speaker / trainer

profile_positions.description: I help entrepreneurs, coaches and trainers with less time, and people who want to share their story or message with the world to write their own book. I developed a practical and working 1-on-1 method which can help people to write their books within a period of 4 months. My writer's coaching is a combination of my experienced writing and publishing skills and my personal development coaching mastery. In this writing journey I am also the first editor of your book. I coach writers with their books in the Dutch and English language.
profile_positions.title: Writer's Coach/#Schrijfcoach/#Boekfluencer
